org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces
Class AbstractInt32Array

java.lang.Object
  org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces.AbstractInterface
      org.epics.ioc.pdrv.interfaces.AbstractInt32Array
All Implemented Interfaces:
Int32Array, Interface
public abstract class AbstractInt32Array
extends AbstractInterface
implements Int32Array

Abstract interface for Int32Array. It provides the following features:

  • registers the interface
  • Provides a default implementation of all methods.
    In particular it calls interrupt listeners.
  • Provides method interruptOccured, which derived classes should call whenever data is written. It calls the interrupt listeners via a separate thread and with no locks held.

Author:
mrk
